name: Subito.it switch to Figma • 2 of 3
description:
Subito.it —n. 1 digital company in Italy 🇮🇹 to buy and sell— asked for our help with the transition from Sketch to Figma.


Migrated their Design System, recreating: 🎨 styles, ✍🏻 typography, 🧩 atoms, ⚡ components, 🦋 organisms!


Passed on our expertise: 💪🏻 Variants, 👑 Master components, 📦 Nested components, 👀 Hidden layer... not buzzword, but key concepts to use Figma at its best!


Last but not least, training time! 📚 Figma theory, 💠 Handoff of the Design System, ✨ Tips & tricks from Figma... and lots of practical exercises!


An amazing experience as the trainer of a fantastic, curious, energetic team!


^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^-^


I created 3 commemorative shots for the job — this is the second
